title: How to Disable Pop Up Blocker on iPad

steps.title: Open Settings .
steps.content: Open Settings . You'll find this grey gear icon on one of your Home screens or in the Utilities folder.

steps.title: Tap Safari.
steps.content: Tap Safari . This is usually in the sixth grouping of options next to a blue compass icon.

steps.title: Tap the toggle next to "Block Pop-ups" to turn it off .
steps.content: Tap the toggle next to "Block Pop-ups" to turn it off . A white toggle indicates that the feature is turned off, so you will get pop-ups. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Open Chrome .
steps.content: Open Chrome . You'll find this red, green, yellow, and blue orb on one of your Home screens.

steps.title: Tap … .
steps.content: Tap … . It's the three dots at the bottom-right corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . This is next to an icon of a gear.

steps.title: Tap Content Settings.
steps.content: Tap Content Settings . You'll find this next to a gear icon under Privacy .

steps.title: Tap Block Pop-ups.
steps.content: Tap Block Pop-ups . This is usually the first option in the menu.

steps.title: Tap the toggle next to "Block Pop-ups" to turn it off .
steps.content: Tap the toggle next to "Block Pop-ups" to turn it off . A white toggle indicates that the feature is off, so you will get pop-ups. [2] X Research source If you are getting pop-ups on a specific site and want to show them, navigate to that site and tap Always show at the bottom of the page where you get pop-up notifications.

steps.title: Open Firefox.
steps.content: Open Firefox. You'll find this orange fox icon on one of your Home screens.

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . It's the three horizontal lines at the bottom-right corner of your screen.

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . You'll find this at the bottom of the menu next to an icon of a gear.

steps.title: Tap the toggle next to "Block Pop-up Windows" to turn it off .
steps.content: Tap the toggle next to "Block Pop-up Windows" to turn it off . A white toggle indicates that the feature is off; pop-ups will come through. [3] X Research source
